mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMID, MEMPW) VALUES (#{memId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memPw, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMID,MEMPW FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMID = #{memId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MEMPW = #{memPw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMPW = #{memPw, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE MEMID = #{memId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
